For example: replace specific character names with "cartoon mouse character" or "superhero character", replace brand names with "colorful cereal" or "sports car", etc. Create inspired-by designs that capture the essence without referencing any protected names or specific copyrighted elements. Never include actual brand names, character names, or trademarked terms in the image generation prompts
- CONTENT SAFETY: Ensure all prompts are family-friendly and appropriate for greeting cards. Avoid any content that could be flagged by safety systems including: violence, weapons, inappropriate imagery, political content, controversial topics, scary or disturbing elements, or anything not suitable for all ages. generatedPrompts.frontCover: Front cover of a graduation card with a 9:16 aspect ratio, featuring a painterly illustration. The scene is set at dusk with a deep blue, star-filled sky transitioning to warm purple and orange hues near the horizon. In the foreground, a person wearing a dark blue graduation cap and gown stands with their back to the viewer, looking out over a landscape. The landscape includes rolling green hills, distant trees, and iconic university buildings illuminated with warm, soft lights. A prominent bell tower, reminiscent of Sather Tower, stands tall on the right side of the image, bathed in the twilight glow. Above the central text, a golden laurel wreath encircles a constellation, hinting at the Gemini constellation. The text "Congratulations, Simoni" is written in elegant, flowing gold script, centered in the upper half of the image. The overall mood is one of hopeful anticipation and accomplishment, conveyed through the warm color palette and the serene nighttime setting. The artistic style is reminiscent of classic illustration with a slightly textured, painterly feel.
generatedPrompts.backCover: Back cover design for a graduation greeting card with a deep navy blue, textured background. A single, delicate gold laurel branch motif is placed in the upper left quadrant of the card. The laurel branch has a subtle sheen and appears to be printed with a foil effect, consistent with the elegant and timeless style of the card. The rest of the background is clean and unadorned, creating a sense of simplicity and sophistication. There is no text visible on this back cover, and it appears to have ample clear space, particularly in the bottom right corner, suggesting it is reserved for a QR code or other informational element. The overall design is minimalist and provides a peaceful, understated resolution to the card's visual narrative, subtly referencing the celebratory theme through the classic laurel motif.

Dominating the center of the composition, slightly off-center to the left, is a beautifully rendered, antique-looking golden astrolabe. The astrolabe is intricate and detailed, with multiple concentric rings, pointers, and marked gradations, all rendered in a rich, burnished gold that catches the subtle light. The overall effect is one of timeless wisdom, exploration, and the vast potential of the future, aligning with the "Smart Style" and "Traditional" tone. The artistic technique emphasizes soft brushstrokes and a luminous quality, creating a classic and elegant aesthetic.
